verbose_text: Previous studies have shown that noradrenaline modulates voltage dependent and voltage independent potassium conductances and hyperpolarization activated cyclic nucleotide gated (HCN) channels, thus generating a tonic depolarization by reducing the spike after hyperpolarization and prolonging the depolarizing effect of excitatory synaptic inputs.
evidence: noradrenaline modulates voltage-dependent and voltage-independent potassium
